label: 押領使
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A public constable originally appointed for the duration of some provincial emergency. By late Heian times the post had become hereditary within certain prominent local-officer houses (zaichōkanjin). It declined in importance with the onset of Kamakura times and the creation of a shugo network.　[在庁官人、守護]
